ModMetaData.name: Relevant Stats In Description
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img]
Depending on the type of building, selected stats are shown in the description-window in the architect-menu. This can make it easier to select the best wall for your defence or the right power-generator for your current need.
Each stat can be turned off in the settings if they are not needed. Can be added/removed from existing save.
Supported mods [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2062943477]Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power[/url]: Shows Helixien Gas use/production [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1321849735]Rimefeller[/url]: Shows Chemfuel use [/list]
If you have suggestion of stats that would be usable to show for certain buildings, leave a comment here or on the Discord server linked below.
- German translation added, thanks Dimos!
